import React from 'react' export default class Forms extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { post: '', declarant: '', passportSeries: '', passportNumber: '', passportGiveDate: '', passportWhoGive: '', addressIndex: '', addressRegion: '', addressLocation: '', firmName: '', firmCountry: '', firmAddress: '', transCost: '', productInfo: [ { codeTNVD: '', stakeTP: '', productName: '', productTarget: '', productDescription: '', сount: '', spaceCount: '', countKg: '', invoiceCost: '', invoiceCostSELECT: '', grossWeight: '', netWeight: '' } ], moreInfo: [], } this.handlerChangeInfo = this.handlerChangeInfo.bind(this) this.addProduct = this.addProduct.bind(this) } handlerChangeInfo(evt) { const dataName = evt.target.name this.setState({[`${dataName}`]: evt.target.value}) // console.log(evt.target.name) // console.log(evt.target.value) } handlerChangeInfoArr(evt) { const dataName = evt.target.name.split('-') console.log(dataName[0]) // this.setState( (state) => { // const cloneProductInfo = Object.assign([], state.productInfo) // cloneProductInfo[`${dataName[1]}`][`${dataName[0]}`] = evt.target.value // return {productInfo: cloneProductInfo} // }) } addProduct() { this.setState( (state) => { // const cloneTodos = Object.assign([], state.todos) //клонирование массива const cloneProductInfo = Object.assign([], state.productInfo) const prodInfoItem = { codeTNVD: '', stakeTP: '', productName: '', productTarget: '', productDescription: '', сount: '', spaceCount: '', countKg: '', invoiceCost: '', invoiceCostSELECT: '', grossWeight: '', netWeight: '' } cloneProductInfo.push(prodInfoItem) return {productInfo: cloneProductInfo} }) } render() { // const advancedFields = this.props.orderType === '1000' ? //
//
// // Код по ТН ВЭД //
// // выбрать код // // //
